column4: My dell wireless card is broadcom BCM4328 (rev3) which apparently works with ubuntu 8.04 using ndiswrapper. Does anyone know if ndis comes with 8.04 and how to get it going so I can get online?
its on the cd if you want to use that, you'll also need the windows driver
ndiswrapper is on the ubuntu 8.04 cd? You mean i will have to install the windows driver into ubuntu?
install ndiswrapper, download the windows driver and use the walkthrough ubottu gives you
